alert.note: Alert for Gage; Jefferson; Saline; Seward (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 5:44AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of south central Seward, Jefferson, Saline and northwestern Gage Counties through 615 AM CDT... At 543 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 2 miles east of Swanton to near Daykin to Strang. Movement was southeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down small tree branches and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... De Witt and Plymouth around 550 AM CDT. Beatrice and Jansen around 600 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of these storms include Harbine and Fairbury. People attending Jefferson County Fairgrounds should seek safe shelter immediately! MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
